entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
